title: Is it wrong to be over opinionated? - Quora

response.answer_text: The harm is not in being overopinionated but in being less knowledgeable. Opinions tend to be separate from truth, or exaggerate it, driven by ego or bias.
I respond to an situation. With passion or less passion. You can like it or hated. And we meet on agreement or disagreement in the end. Feels like the nature of all human interaction.
